## Plankton Distributions

:::: {style="display: flex"}

::: {}

![](images/odv1.png){width=100%}
:::

::: {}


The distributions of **z-scores** for phytoplankton, bacterioplankton, and particle-proxy parameters shown to the right represent campaign composites. Profile data are displayed by white and black "+" symbols, where black symbols represent casts during multiday stations (N2S4, 47˚N; N3S6, 53˚N). 


:::

::::

## Mixed Layer Depths

Mixed layer changes were very different between the two stations, with rapid shoaling of a deep mixed layer at N2S4 and a fairly unchanging shallow mixed layer at N3S6.

:::: {style="display: flex"}

::: {}

N2S4

![](images/s4_mld.png){width=100%}
:::

::: {}

N3S6

![](images/s6_mld.png){width=100%}


:::
